title: Add TaskSpec/TaskResult templates + examples
context: This repo is a long-term Codex CLI playground. After adding PLAYBOOK.md, we now want reusable templates and one concrete example so the workflow is copy/pasteable.
instructions: Create tasks/TEMPLATE.task_spec.json as a minimal, well-commented example TaskSpec that conforms to docs/contracts/task_spec_v0_1.schema.json.
Create docs/examples/TEMPLATE.task_result.json as a valid example TaskResult that conforms to docs/contracts/task_result_v0_1.schema.json.
Create docs/examples/README.md explaining (in Chinese) how to use these templates with codex exec and how to validate TaskResult using tools/validate_task_result.py.
Update PLAYBOOK.md with links to the new templates/examples section (keep it short).
Do not change schemas in docs/contracts/.
Do not modify any other files.
acceptance: tasks/TEMPLATE.task_spec.json exists and is a valid TaskSpec.
docs/examples/README.md exists and gives a practical step-by-step.
No files under docs/contracts/ were changed.
